name: trace

effect.sun_moon: Can copy flower gift and wonder guard.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Can copy flower gift and wonder guard.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Can copy flower gift and wonder guard.

short_effect: Copies an opponent's ability upon entering battle.

flavor_text.sun_moon: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon copies an opposing Pokémon’s Ability.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon copies an opposing Pokémon’s Ability.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon copies an opposing Pokémon’s Ability.
